title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2264/94 of 20 September 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2604/90, relating to detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1200/90 on the improvement of Community production of apples
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2264/94 of 20 September 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2604/90, relating to detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1200/90 on the improvement of Community production of apples
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 September 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
